title: Xbox boss Phil Spencer says the metaverse is like 'a poorly built videogame'
description: Spencer and other tech executives are not particularly upbeat about the current state of the metaverse.

description: After getting deep into Call of Duty, Destiny, and F1 racing, Moretz is fielding PC gaming tips.

title: McPixel 3, the game about solving problems in stupid ways, is coming in November
description: Avert disaster and save the day across 100 wildly bizarre levels.

title: Dragon Age: Dreadwolf is now fully playable from start to finish
description: The new Dragon Age has hit its alpha milestone, which means developers can now start to focus on improving graphics and gameplay.

title: InXile celebrates 20 years by remembering that time it made a baby game and got swept up in a moral panic
description: At least you can look back and laugh: No, not like that!

title: Rocksteady co-founders are leaving the studio just months ahead of Suicide Squad's release
description: Jamie Walker and Sefton Hill, who founded Rocksteady in 2004, are starting "a new adventure together in games."

title: Overwatch 2 players call new $26 skin bundle 'greedy'
description: The new Witch Kiriko skin has brewed some toil and trouble.

title: Fallout TV series shows off a wasteland set, Nuka-Cola, and power armor
description: Director Jonathan Nolan is interviewed on the Fallout set, says "I'm not familiar with Fallout" while sipping Nuka-Cola.

title: This site lets you play any Doom WAD file just like that

title: I played this spellbindingly complex 4X classic, and all I got was a lot of dead halflings
